SocialED.tests package¶

Submodules¶

SocialED.tests.test_adpsemevent module¶

SocialED.tests.test_bert module¶

SocialED.tests.test_bert.test_detection(sample_dataset)[source]¶

Test event detection functionality.

Parameters:

sample_dataset (DatasetLoader) – Sample dataset for testing detection.

Returns:

Asserts that predictions match ground truth length.

Return type:

None

SocialED.tests.test_bert.test_evaluate(sample_dataset)[source]¶

Test evaluation of detection results.

Parameters:

sample_dataset (DatasetLoader) – Sample dataset for testing evaluation.

Returns:

Asserts that evaluation metrics are valid floats.

Return type:

None

SocialED.tests.test_bert.test_get_bert_embeddings(sample_dataset)[source]¶

Test extraction of BERT embeddings from text.

Parameters:

sample_dataset (DatasetLoader) – Sample dataset for testing embeddings.

Returns:

Asserts that embeddings are numpy arrays of correct shape.

Return type:

None

SocialED.tests.test_bert.test_preprocess(sample_dataset)[source]¶

Test preprocessing of text data.

Parameters:

sample_dataset (DatasetLoader) – Sample dataset for testing preprocessing.

Returns:

Asserts that processed text column exists and contains strings.

Return type:

None
